data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=d3iuLf7H1O0Q7kNvgHt5D8D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYBm9WcBMRJZCLpSZMtg2aPE0upJwiuQLbcYhboVZGAd3A&oe=66EABA1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XYOWceFDjGwQ7kNvgGdtU7i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYAplQhAkWaR8_gqZXCJd4uChXf1LQ8RIAsbYA6QlZjmXA&oe=66EAC3A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=D4Wub3vQ3XwQ7kNvgGianKl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYAMlg8rZcckQI8xkNRKfr4SVQuKyQ50_SkhJ5SDb8N6bg&oe=66EAAB07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PGFu1WW6-7kQ7kNvgFb3V5t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYC3R-LF6GLHI99_F_xRSG_1fkF_nm2KCT-7NPJRwOUKqg&oe=66EA9DE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BoPFoKmEw_0Q7kNvgHd8e2z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYBULKynlkYaZOFmQRL_U-nnkD9Rkzw1HqqYGMV8RgA4lA&oe=66EACA58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gvvkfiW3T8EQ7kNvgHYKt36&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYC8mM5c8FowFPszdCzaUUp9hb5bCc9nnXHsyA8PlRI8wA&oe=66EAC6D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=C7DiPHDlX3IQ7kNvgGJCCFV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYDKH5PwdkDHePD0fyg2IkJg06uGIPlKyE-IAnU3DODU2A&oe=66EAACF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Q8_ka5aCZTQQ7kNvgHYBMk7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYDJXrN4xW_gEOiryEL4nZ9jcMVdwkt1pFf1T8lJoLpi_A&oe=66EA976A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-bx31cqBXNcQ7kNvgFDfQcF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYAH3IwWHYJQkgEfb1aquJS38TGb4JOzSirxM8_flhi5pg&oe=66EAAB17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OPIr-Bk81pYQ7kNvgFgluE9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdB_FSvkKnRc4hr2d-KNy70&oh=00_AYAL7NRoH9AwijrpoJwK9-3oD753P4oR1XTx9zecJOZi1g&oe=66EAC68C)
